gr.interamerican.bo2.legacy
Class LegacyPwAdapter<P extends >

java.lang.Object
  AbstractResourceConsumer
      gr.interamerican.bo2.legacy.LegacyWorkerAdapter
          gr.interamerican.bo2.legacy.LegacyPwAdapter<P>
Type Parameters:
P - Type of persistent object.
public class LegacyPwAdapter<P extends >
extends LegacyWorkerAdapter

PersistenceWorker based on a legacy persistence worker. This implementation assumes that the implementation of the PersistentObject is a LegacyPoAdapter to the actual legacy Bo persistent object.
The getDetachStrategy() method of this PersistenceWorker will always return null, since there was nu such feature as a DetachStrategy in legacy Bo persistent objects.
